Headline: Weather-related impacts on bus service
ShortDescription: Heavy rain is affecting many roadways in the region; allow extra travel time and expect that some buses may need to be rerouted due to flooding in low areas.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Heavy rain and effects from it is affecting roadways in many areas including causing localized flooding in spots throughout the region.

Please allow extra travel time and expect that some buses may need to be rerouted if streets become flooded, especially in low-lying areas such as where streets pass under road and railway viaducts.

Alerts will be updated as information becomes available on any specific reroutes.

Headline: No Trains Between UIC Halsted to Kedzie
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between UIC Halsted and Kedzie due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between UIC Halsted and Kedzie due to track conditions.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and UIC Halsted, and,
  • between Kedzie and Forest Park, only.

Shuttle buses are available between UIC Halsted and Kedzie to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 54th/Cermak and Central Park
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Central Park and 54th/Cermak due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Central Park and 54th/Cermak due to track conditions.

As a result, trains are operating only between the Loop and Central Park at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area Central Park to 54th/Cermak.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

 

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
